Researchers want use MRI well understand function pattern connection brain region healthy people . This might help people brain diseases future . Objectives : - To evaluate MRI method perform twice day . - To evaluate brain function use positron emission tomography ( PET ) . Eligibility : - Healthy volunteer least 18 year old . DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : The overarch goal study quantify reproducibility multiple measure brain functional connectivity ( FC ) rest condition task performance . Secondary objective assess dynamic property energy requirement human brain connectome well effect physiologic noise , gender age measure brain functional connectivity rest task performance . Study population : 60 healthy male 60 female 18 year old include . Design : Participants undergo two MRI/MRS session evaluate test-retest reliability FC rest well task performance , one 18F-Fluorodeoxyglucose ( FDG ) -PET session ass association FC glucose metabolism human brain . Outcome parameter : The variability gender age effect FC measure ( lFCD , L , C , S ) collect RS TS condition , quantify use volxelwise ICC . The variability brain metabolite concentration precuneus .
